auth.badUsername: No user found with this username
auth.usernameTaken: This username is already taken. Please choose another one.
auth.emailInUse: This email is already in use in an active account.
auth.challengeExpired: The challenge has expired. Please try again.
auth.noPasskey: No passkey registered for this user.
auth.passkeyLoginFailed: Passkey login failed. Please try again.

totp.registerFailed: Failed to register TOTP. Please try again.
totp.notEnabled: You must enable TOTP to perform this action.
totp.needTOTP: You need to provide a TOTP code to perform this action.

server.connectionRefused: Connection refused. Please try again later.

successes.setUpTOTP: TOTP has been set up successfully.

register.title: Associate a Passkey with your account. Doing so will allow you to log in with a single click, while adding an extra layer of security.

remove.title: Your account has a passkey associated with it. It is used to log in to your account in one click while adding an extra layer of security.

modal.title: Remove Passkey
modal.description: Are you sure you want to remove this passkey? This action cannot be undone.

logIn.title: Log in with TOTP
logIn.description: Enter your TOTP code to log in.

enable.description: 2FA is not enabled for your account.

manage.title: Manage TOTP
manage.description: You can manage your TOTP settings here.

secondStep.description: Confirm your identity by entering your TOTP code.

setup.title: Set up TOTP
setup.description: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app to set up TOTP.
setup.unableToScan: Unable to scan? You can show the secret key :

success.title: TOTP Setup Successful
success.description: You have successfully set up TOTP for your account.
success.message: Your account is now protected with a second layer of security thanks to TOTP.
